did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Robert E. Hussey Notebooks must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Hussey, Robert E. Notebooks, 1928-1937, n.d., Ms1955-004, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated to the former Chemistry Library on campus in 1955. The notebooks were later transferred to the University Libraries and Special Collections.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Robert E. Hussey Notebooks was completed in 2004. Some additional description was completed in 2013.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Dr. Robert E. Hussey was a professor in chemistry at Virginia Polytechnic Institute from 1925 to 1952, becoming Emeritus Professor of Organic Chemistry in 1960.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The Robert E. Hussey Notebooks contain three research report notebooks which includes chemistry notes with papers and samples interleafed between the pages.
